text: After some time you realise that you are going in
circles.
The smoke is getting closer. You hear wolves but
fortunately you find a &4Rusty Knife&0.
You run, but the wolves catch up.
You make noise to draw attention of these wolves.
To your suprise, instead of wolves there is only
one wounded wolf.
After defeating the wolf you see a rabbit. He left
you &4Carrots&0. They're for sure tasty.
The women shows you the way to the road. She also
proposes you to take her homemade &4Heal Potion I&0 and
&4Mana Potion I&0. You thank her and head toward the
road.
You take some &4Water&0 from the well.
In front of you stand a giant insect. It looks like
a beetle of some sort. Before you tried to back off
the beetle spotted you.
The beetle is dead. You search the cave and find
a pouch full of gold lying next to a dead body. It
contains&4 100 coins&0. You also find a &4Rusty Short
Sword&0.
Unfortunately the tavern is closed. There's a piece
of paper with text on it: "Closed 'till beta ends!"
Whatever that means.
You spotted some woman cleaning windows. When asked
about recent events she told you that the kindgom
is facing a invasion of evil humanoids that want to
burn the whole country. Apart from that she told
you to have yourself some &4Apples&0 from the basket.
They are fresh from the harvest.
The bandit drops dead. You search his body and find
a pouch full of gold, surely robbed from someone.
It contains&4 100 coins&0.
